channel.title: Object Help!
channel.description:
OK So i decided to make a new skilling area, well hes my problum iv never coded a pi server before and have little xp on coding, i know how do add objects just making the player woodcut the tree, mine rock or even making a bank work i have noidea how to do that if someone could help me i would realy apprecate it.
PS i have look on google and mopar for help and i just not sure what im looking for but i have tryed my self
Edit: I just Want to know how i can make the tree i put in my skilling area chopable and when u chop it u get 1 log and like 1k coins?
